0P0000P7N0.F.long_name: CBIS European Short Term Government Bond Fund
0P0000P7N0.F.summary: The investment objective of the European Short Term Government Bond Fund is to provide current income, consistent with the preservation of capital. The European Short Term Government Bond Fund will invest primarily in a diversified portfolio of high quality, Euro-denominated deposits and short term fixed-income securities provided that not more than 50% of the Net Asset Value of the Fund may be invested in Euro-denominated deposits.

0P0000W6HS.F.manager_bio: Leads Portfolio Manager of Pioneer F - Euro Reserve. Cosimo joined PioneerInvestm in 2000 after completing a Masters in Asset Mgm from Bocconi Univ, and Univ College Dublin. Before the Masters he worked as a Fixed Income Ptf Manager with Euroconsult in Milan. Previously worked as a Fixed Income Trader with Banca Akros in Milan. Cosimo is a Business Engineer graduate of Milan Politechnical with qualific in Fixed Income Ptf Mgm from Bocconi Univ. Cosimo works closely with a team of fixed income specialists.
